Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute at Damen/Ohio
ShortDescription: 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Chicago, Western, Grand & Damen, due to police activity near Damen/Ohio.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Chicago, Western, Grand, then resume their normal route on Damen, due to police activity near Damen/Ohio.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Reroute at 55th/Talman
ShortDescription: 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Garfield, Western, 51st, California and 55th, due to street blockage near 55th/Talman.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Garfield, Western, 51st, California, then resume their normal route on 55th, due to street blockage near 55th/Talman.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Cumberland
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Cumberland due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Cumberland due to police activity. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Service Delayed near Harlem/Lake
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are standing near Harlem/Lake due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are standing near Harlem/Lake due to a sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
